params.script:
import dataiku
import pandas as pd, numpy as np
from dataiku import pandasutils as pdu
from datetime import date

# Create managed folder
api_client = dataiku.api_client()
project = api_client.get_project("GIT")
new_folder = project.create_managed_folder("store_data")

# Read inputs
dataset_1 = dataiku.Dataset("apple-store-test")
df_1 = dataset_1.get_dataframe()
dataset_2 = dataiku.Dataset("AppleStore_copy")
df_2 = dataset_2.get_dataframe()

# Get managed folder path
store_data = dataiku.Folder("store_data")
store_data_path = store_data.get_path()
today = date.today()
d1 = today.strftime("%d-%m-%Y")
# Store datasets
df_1.to_csv(f'{store_data_path}/{d1}+dataset_1.csv')
df_2.to_csv(f'{store_data_path}/{d1}+dataset_2.csv')
